Structs/MySQLAlterTable/ColumnPosition.h.name: first
Structs/MySQLAlterTable/ColumnPosition.h.abstract: Add the column at the beginning of the table.

Structs/MySQLAlterTable/ColumnPosition.h.name: after
Structs/MySQLAlterTable/ColumnPosition.h.abstract: Add the column after a given column.

Structs/MySQLAlterTable/ColumnPosition.h.name: ColumnPosition
Structs/MySQLAlterTable/ColumnPosition.h.abstract: Specifies the position of a column being added to a table.

Structs/MySQLCharacterSet.html#/s:5MySQL.name: init(string:)
Structs/MySQLCharacterSet.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Creates a new MySQLCharacterSet from a string. Can return nil if the string is a invalid or unsupported collation.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: init(rawValue:)
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Create a new MySQLCapabilityFlags from the upper and lower values.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_LONG_PASSWORD
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Use the improved version of Old Password Authentication.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_FOUND_ROWS
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Send found rows instead of affected rows in EOF_Packet.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_CONNECT_WITH_DB
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Database (schema) name can be specified on connect in Handshake Response Packet.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_IGNORE_SIGPIPE
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Client: Do not issue SIGPIPE if network failures occur (libmysqlclient only).

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_TRANSACTIONS
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Can send status flags in EOF_Packet.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_MULTI_STATEMENTS
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Can handle multiple statements per COM_QUERY and COM_STMT_PREPARE.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_MULTI_RESULTS
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Can send multiple resultsets for COM_QUERY.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_PS_MULTI_RESULTS
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Can send multiple resultsets for COM_STMT_EXECUTE.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_PLUGIN_AUTH
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Sends extra data in Initial Handshake Packet and supports the pluggable authentication protocol.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_PLUGIN_AUTH_LENENC_CLIENT_DATA
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Understands length-encoded integer for auth response data in Protocol::HandshakeResponse41.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_CAN_HANDLE_EXPIRED_PASSWORDS
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Announces support for expired password extension.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_SESSION_TRACK
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Can set SERVER_SESSION_STATE_CHANGED in the Status Flags and send session-state change data after a OK packet.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.name: CLIENT_DEPRECATE_EOF
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html#/s:5MySQL.abstract: Server: Can send OK after a Text Resultset.

Structs/MySQLData.html#/s:5MySQL0A7SQLDa.name: json(_:)
Structs/MySQLData.html#/s:5MySQL0A7SQLDa.abstract: Access the value as JSON encoded data.

Structs/MySQLData.html#/s:5MySQL0A7SQLDa.name: integer(_:)
Structs/MySQLData.html#/s:5MySQL0A7SQLDa.abstract: Access the value as an fixed-width integer.

Structs/MySQLData.html#/s:5MySQL0A7SQLDa.name: float(_:)
Structs/MySQLData.html#/s:5MySQL0A7SQLDa.abstract: Access the value as an binary floating point.

Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.name: cleartext
Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.abstract: Does not attempt to enable TLS (this is the default).

Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.name: unverifiedTLS
Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.1 on the server, but disables certificate verification.

Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.name: standardTLS
Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.1 on the server.

Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.name: modernTLS
Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.2 on the server.

Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.name: edgeTLS
Structs/MySQLTransportConfig.html#/s:5My.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.3 on the server.

Structs/MySQLData.html.name: MySQLData
Structs/MySQLData.html.abstract: Represents row data for a single MySQL column.

Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html.name: MySQLCapabilities
Structs/MySQLCapabilities.html.abstract: The capability flags are used by the client and server to indicate which features they support and want to use.

Structs/MySQLFractionalSecondsPrecision..name: MySQLFractionalSecondsPrecision
Structs/MySQLFractionalSecondsPrecision..abstract: An optional fsp value in the range from 0 to 6 may be given to specify fractional seconds precision.

Structs/MySQLError.html.name: MySQLError
Structs/MySQLError.html.abstract: Errors that can be thrown while working with MySQL.

Protocols/MySQLDataTypeStaticRepresentab.name: MySQLDataTypeStaticRepresentable
Protocols/MySQLDataTypeStaticRepresentab.abstract: A type that can be represented by an appropriate MySQLDataType statically.

Extensions/SQLInsertBuilder.html#/s:3SQL.name: onConflict(set:)
Extensions/SQLInsertBuilder.html#/s:3SQL.abstract: Adds an ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE or upsert clause to the query.

Extensions/SQLAlterTableBuilder.html#/s:.name: order(_:after:)
Extensions/SQLAlterTableBuilder.html#/s:.abstract: Specifies the position of a newly added column in a table relative to an existing column.

Extensions/SQLAlterTableBuilder.html#/s:.name: order(first:)
Extensions/SQLAlterTableBuilder.html#/s:.abstract: Specifies the position of a newly added column in a table as first.

Extensions/ChannelPipeline.html#/s:3NIO1.name: addMySQLClientHandlers(first:)
Extensions/ChannelPipeline.html#/s:3NIO1.abstract: Adds MySQL packet encoder and decoder to the channel pipeline.

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.name: firstValue(forColumn:inTable:)
Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.abstract: Accesses the first value from this dictionary with a matching field name.

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.name: value(forTable:atColumn:)
Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.abstract: Access a Value from this dictionary keyed by MySQLColumns

Enums/MySQLPrimaryKeyDefault.html#/s:5My.name: autoIncrement
Enums/MySQLPrimaryKeyDefault.html#/s:5My.abstract: Primary key will be automatically generated each time a new row is inserted.

Classes/MySQLConnection/Metadata.html#/s.name: affectedRows
Classes/MySQLConnection/Metadata.html#/s.abstract: Number of affected rows from the last query.

Classes/MySQLConnection/Metadata.html#/s.name: lastInsertID
Classes/MySQLConnection/Metadata.html#/s.abstract: AUTO_INCREMENT insert ID from the last query (if exists).

Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.name: lastMetadata
Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.abstract: Pointer to the last metadata returned from a call to query(...) or simpleQuery(...).

Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.name: connect(config:on:)
Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.abstract: Connects to a MySQL server using TCP.

Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.name: query(_:_:)
Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.abstract: Sends a parameterized (a.k.a, prepared or statement protocol query) to the server.

Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.name: simpleQuery(_:)
Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.abstract: Sends a simple query (a.k.a, text protocol query) to the server.

Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.name: simpleQuery(_:onRow:)
Classes/MySQLConnection.html#/s:5MySQL0A.abstract: Sends a simple query (a.k.a, text protocol query) to the server.

Classes/MySQLDatabase.html.name: MySQLDatabase
Classes/MySQLDatabase.html.abstract: Creates connections to an identified MySQL database.

Classes/MySQLProvider.html.name: MySQLProvider
Classes/MySQLProvider.html.abstract: Provides base MySQL services such as database and connection.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
